Uses of Class
ShadowQuest.Camera

    • Uses of Camera in ShadowQuest

      Fields in ShadowQuest declared as Camera 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Camera World.camera
      Game objects
      Methods in ShadowQuest with parameters of type Camera 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Position GameObject.relativePos(Camera camera)
      Return an object's position on screen as the camera moves
      void Villager.renderDialogue(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g, Camera camera)
      Render the relevant dialogue on the screen.
      void Item.renderItem(Camera camera)
      Render the item relative to camera's position
      void Unit.renderLabel(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g, Camera camera)
      Render the unit's label, which displays the name of the unit as well as the current Health of the unit.
      void Monster.renderMonster(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g, Camera camera)
      Render the monster relative to the camera position.
      void GameObject.renderOther(Camera camera)
      Render the GameObject at some location onscreen relative to the camera's position on the map and the GameObject's position on the map
      void Villager.renderVillager(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g, Camera camera)
      Render the villager image itself, then render the villager's label Next, render the villager's dialogue appropriately depending on the context if the villager was interacted with recently.
